content.question: Which of the following best explains the primary function of international political boundaries?

choices.label: Boundaries define national identity and encourage a patriotism that make local cultures recognizable.
Boundaries limit international trade and improve regional economies within the country.
Boundaries limit sovereignty and determine the extent of a state's power within the global political system.
Boundaries promote international relations between neighboring states and encourage peace.
Boundaries resolve disputes over water resources and determine which countries have the right to extract water.

content.answer: Boundaries limit sovereignty and determine the extent of a state's power within the global political system.
